objects.description:
As a user, I can unlock PUK lock of either SIM card in SIM security setting.

Prerequisite: 1. Device which support Dual SIM Dual Standby. 2. Insert 2 PIN enabled SIM cards into DUT.
objects.name: [DSDS] Unlock PUK code in SIM security setting

steps.instruction: Go to Settings > SIM Manager > SIM security, press toggle button of SIM 1.

steps.expected: PUK entry will show.
steps.instruction: Enter wrong SIM 1 PIN for three times.

steps.expected: PUK can be unlocked.
steps.instruction: Enter correct SIM 1 PUK code and input new PIN code.

steps.expected: PUK entry will show.
steps.instruction: Enter wrong SIM 2 PIN for three times.

steps.expected: PUK can be unlocked.
steps.instruction: Enter correct SIM 2 PUK code and input new PIN code.

tags.description: Test cases for Dual SIM Dual Standby function. Only test on DSDS supported devices.
tags.name: DSDS

objects.description:
As a user, I can not access Message Settings while SIM card is locked.

Prerequisite: 1. Device which support Dual SIM Dual Standby. 2. Insert 2 SIMs into the device.
objects.name: [DSDS] Access Message Settings (PIN enabled)

steps.instruction: Go to Settings > SIM manager > SIM security.
Enable SIM 1 PIN.

steps.expected: SIM 1 PIN entry shows.
steps.instruction: Reboot device.
Skip it.

steps.expected: A page for users to choose which SIM they want to configure but SIM 1 is grey out. Unable to access it.
steps.instruction: Go to Settings > Message Settings.
Enable SIM 2 PIN in SIM security setting and reboot device.
SIM 1 and SIM 2 PIN entry shows and skip it.

steps.expected: Unable to access Message settings due to both SIM are locked.
steps.instruction: Go to Settings > Message Settings.

tags.description: Test cases for Dual SIM Dual Standby function. Only test on DSDS supported devices.
tags.name: DSDS

objects.description:
As a user, I can access Message Settings of either one of available SIM cards.

Prerequisite: 1. Device which support Dual SIM Dual Standby. 2. Insert 2 SIMs into the device.
objects.name: [DSDS] Access Message Settings (Two SIM inserted)

steps.expected: A page for users to choose which SIM they want to configure.
steps.instruction: Go to Settings > Message Settings.

steps.expected: It will list all Message Settings items for SIM 1.
steps.instruction: Select SIM 1.

steps.expected: It will list all Message Settings items for SIM 2.
steps.instruction: Go back and select SIM 2.

tags.description: Test cases for Dual SIM Dual Standby function. Only test on DSDS supported devices.
tags.name: DSDS

objects.description:
As a user, I can only open the Message Settings of the slot which has SIM card inserted.

Prerequisite: 1. Device which support Dual SIM Dual Standby. 2. Insert 1 SIMs into the device.
objects.name: [DSDS] Access Message Settings (One SIM inserted)

steps.expected: A page for users to choose which SIM they want to configure but only allow user to select the SIM which is in DUT, another one will be grey out.
steps.instruction: Go to Settings > Message Settings.

steps.expected: It will list all Message Settings items for the SIM.
steps.instruction: Select the available SIM.

tags.description: Test cases for Dual SIM Dual Standby function. Only test on DSDS supported devices.
tags.name: DSDS

objects.description:
As a user, I can not access Message Settings when there is no SIM card in device.

Prerequisite: 1. Device which support Dual SIM Dual Standby. 2. No SIM inserted.
objects.name: [DSDS] Access Message Settings (No SIM inserted)

steps.expected: This setting is grey out, unable to open it.
steps.instruction: Go to Settings > Message Settings.

tags.description: Test cases for Dual SIM Dual Standby function. Only test on DSDS supported devices.
tags.name: DSDS

steps.expected: Then "stars" collection is removed from homescreen.
steps.instruction: When I click "remove"

steps.expected: Then I should see a prompt to "Remove Perkelefrom the Homescreen?"

steps.expected: Then "Perkele" collection is removed from homescreen.
steps.instruction: When I click "remove"

steps.expected: Then I get a notification "games added to home screen."
steps.instruction: When I press the "star"

objects.description: Prerequisites:  there must already be several collections added, including "games", and apps installed.
objects.name: Test that it's possible to Reorganize collections & apps across homescreen pages

steps.expected: Then my "games" collection is relocated to next tab over, and throb mode is turned off.

steps.expected: Then "email" app icon is relocated to e.me homescreen, and throb mode is turned off.
steps.instruction: When I drag my "email" app icon to the e.me homescreen

steps.expected: Then my music collection is relocated from homescreen to two screens to the right.
steps.instruction: When I drag my "music" collection from e.me homescreen to two screens to the right, and hit home button

objects.description: Prerequisites:  there must be "Showbiz" collection added
objects.name: Test that it should be possible to rename my collections

steps.expected: Then "Entertainment" collection shows up where "Showbiz" collection once was.
steps.instruction: When I press X or home button

objects.name: [Keyboard][OOM] First time launches built-in keyboard

steps.instruction: Restart the device
Launch the browser app

steps.expected: Built-in keyboard pops up
steps.instruction: Tap the URL field

tags.description:
If this is the "Keyboard" test suite, you should have the "UI Test App".  Install it as follows:

1. Connect to the internet on your phone via WiFi or Data. 
2. Go to http://mozqa.com/webapi-permissions-tests/ in your B2G Browser.
3. scroll down to "Packaged App Test Case 13"
4. Click "Install Packaged App" button on the page.
5. The "UI Test" app should appear on your homescreen.

(Please disregard this step if this is "Keyboard & Text Handling" or any other suite).
tags.name: keyboard

objects.name: [Keyboard][OOM] Kill the built-in keyboard process then tapping the search field of E.ME

steps.instruction: Enable built-in keyboard and disable third party keyboard
Tap search field of e.me to launch built-in keyboard
Tap the blank space to dismiss keyboard

Use the following commands to kill built-in keyboard
$ adb shell b2g-info
$ adb shell kill "#PROCESS_ID"

steps.expected: FxOS launches the built-in keyboard without getting any problem

objects.description:
APZ - https://wiki.mozilla.org/Platform/GFX/APZ
This affects all gaia, testing various apps should be the target, this test is written generically to be able to work with most apps.
objects.name: APZ Test

steps.expected: app should launch
steps.instruction: Launch app

steps.expected: Not all apps are meant to zoom in or zoom out.  We still want to check if you can do so on apps that are not meant to do so.  If you're not sure, ask.  With APZ turned on there are bugs where certain apps that should not zoom zoom in or out.
steps.instruction: try to zoom in or out.

steps.expected: Same as above; scroll bars should appear when panning.
steps.instruction: Try panning left, right, up and down.

steps.expected: same as above; no graphics glitch should occur.
steps.instruction: try double tap zoom in/out.

steps.expected: if home screen mode is on, you may get the home screen when swiping up; otherwise the app should act accordingly.
steps.instruction: try two finger swipping left right, up and down.

steps.expected: the app should function as a long tap accordingly; ie long tapping on a link in browser should bring up a context menu.  long tapping on a picture in gallery should bring out full screen mode.  long tapping on nothing should not do anything in most cases.
steps.instruction: try long tapping

steps.expected: tapping on an action button should correspond to the action.  There should be a hit highlight for any action button pressed.
steps.instruction: Tap on an action button
If the app is capable try full screen mode.  ie gallery via long tapping on an image.  then try steps 2 through the step above.

steps.expected: A viewport change occurs, this may or may not cause issues with the size of the content on screen.
steps.instruction: change orientations on the device

steps.expected: verify that you can scroll in both locations accordingly without any graphics glitch.
steps.instruction: Try using apps that have iframe within iframe: like using browser and going to etherpad.com or using email and composing and looking in the composing window.

steps.expected: The overlay shouldn't impact the app other than the action you take on the overlay (ie button pressed); since we're cancelling nothing should happen to the app.
steps.instruction: If there's a way to get an overlay on top, try to get it.  ie, context menu and such.  Try panning zooming, etc. in the overlay and then cancel it.

steps.expected: should not have any graphics glitch.
steps.instruction: Text, Images, Videos, Webgl render differently.  If there's a way to have that show in the app, try to do so, and try 2 ~ this step on those items.

steps.expected: Try the same thing using the change of orientation.  It should work the same way and fit in the viewport.
steps.instruction: Repeat 2 ~ the step above.

steps.expected: There shouldn't be a graphics glitch.  What we're looking for is the change of icons and coordinate space doesn't cause a graphics glitch.
steps.instruction: Try the various things of 2 through the last step above on various devices that have different resolutions. Buri versus Helix versus Flatfish

objects.description:
Prerequisite: 1. Replace the Update URL to workable URL (optional)

Reference: https://moztrap.mozilla.org/manage/case/8952/
objects.name: [OTA] Data Migration of Call log

steps.expected: Dialer app can be launched.
steps.instruction: Open Dialer app.

steps.expected: Can make the phone call and receive the phone call
steps.instruction:
To make some call logs
(1) Incoming calls and answer the calls => 10 calls

(2)  Incoming calls and without answer the calls => 10 calls

(3) Outgoing calls => 10 calls

(4) Hidden number incoming call and answer the calls => 10 calls

(5) Hidden number incoming call and without answer the calls => 10 calls

steps.expected: The call log page has the phone call history.
steps.instruction: Check call log.

steps.expected: Pass #8952.
steps.instruction: Run #8952 - [OTA] Install OTA update package.

steps.expected: Dialer app can be launched.
steps.instruction: Open Dialer app.

steps.expected: The original call logs still existed.
steps.instruction: Check the call log.

objects.description:
Prerequisite: 1. Replace the Update URL to workable URL (optional)

Reference: https://moztrap.mozilla.org/manage/case/8952/
objects.name: [OTA] Data Migration of Clock app

steps.expected: Clock app can be launched.
steps.instruction: Open Clock app.

steps.expected: Can add the alarms.
steps.instruction:
Add 5 alarms.

(1) Alarm name:  Alarm 1, Time: 06:00 AM, Repeat: Never, Sound:Classic Buzz, Vibrate: ON, Snooze: 5 minutes, Enable: ON


(2) Alarm name:  Alarm 2, Time: 10:30 AM, Repeat: Weekdays, Sound:Gem Echoes, Vibrate: OFF, Snooze: 10 minutes, Enable: OFF


(3) Alarm name:  Alarm 3, Time: 12:00 AM, Repeat: Weekend, Sound:Into the void, Vibrate: OFF, Snooze: 15 minutes, Enable: ON


(4) Alarm name:  Alarm 4, Time: 01:14 AM, Repeat: Wed. & Sat., Sound:Classic Buzz, Vibrate: ON, Snooze: 20 minutes, Enable: OFF


(5) Alarm name:  Alarm 5, Time: 06:57 AM, Repeat: Fri., Sound:Classic Buzz, Vibrate: OFF, Snooze: 5 minutes, Enable: ON

steps.expected: Pass #8952.
steps.instruction: Run #8952 - [OTA] Install OTA update package.

steps.expected: Clock app can be launched.
steps.instruction: Open Clock app.

steps.expected: The original alarm configuration still existed.
steps.instruction: Check the alarms.

objects.description:

objects.name: [OTA] Data Migration of Calendar app

steps.expected: Could sign in properly without any problem
steps.instruction: Sign in Google or other service account

steps.expected: The events could be added in on-line account
steps.instruction:
Add the events in on-line account

(1) 

Title: Event 1, 

Where: Taipei, 

Event time:  06/08/2015 10:30 AM ~ 06/08/2015 11:30 AM

Remide me: 30 minutes before

Note: event1

(2) 

Title: Event 2, 

Where: New York, 

Event time:  07/10/2015 02:30 AM ~ 07/10/2015 04:30 AM

Remide me: 

- At time of event

- 15 minutes before

Note: event2

(3) 

Title: Event 3, 

Where: Beijing, 

Event time:  10/08/2015 10:00 AM ~ 10/09/2015 12:00 AM

Remide me: 

- 1 hour before

- 2 hours before

Note: event3

steps.expected: The events could be added as off-line events
steps.instruction:
Add the events in off-line account

(1) 

Title: Event 4, 

Where: Paris, 

Event time:  (All day event) 10/10/2015 ~ 10/10/2015
